scriptTemplate: Create a dynamic 60-second brand video script for {brandName}, focused on digital music ownership and control. The brand tone is {tone}. The script should convey how {brandName} empowers musicians and creators to own their content through blockchain technology. Focus on these brand values: decentralization, creator economy, ownership. Include phrases about how EditTrax is revolutionizing the music industry by putting creators first. End with a powerful call to action encouraging viewers to join the decentralized music revolution.

prompts: A dark digital landscape with purple and blue accents, showing audio waveforms and blockchain visualizations, representing the music revolution
Artists and musicians gaining control of their work through technology, shown in a retrofuturistic style with {accentColor} highlights
A visualization of on-chain music ownership, with digital tokens connected to music tracks, dark background with glowing elements
A musician with complete creative control, surrounded by digital interfaces showing blockchain transactions and music waveforms, dark stylish setting
A community of creators collaborating in a digital space with {primaryColor} and {accentColor} glowing elements, representing decentralization
A DJ or producer confidently managing their music assets through a futuristic interface with purple highlights

elements.leftPrompt: A frustrated musician dealing with traditional music industry problems like lack of control and profit loss, desaturated colors
elements.rightPrompt: The same musician empowered with {brandName} technology, taking control of their music distribution and profits, vibrant with {accentColor} highlights
